markdown:
**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 125 2.0 **Usage** affixed to armor or a weapon --- This miniature wooden planchette is engraved with symbols designed to attract spirits. When affixed, the symbols begin to glow, and the planchette turns slightly insubstantial. The spell DC of any spell cast by activating this item is 29.
  • **Armor** After you cast a spell by activating the planchette, you gain [resistance](/Rules.aspx?ID=2312) 5 to all physical damage (except [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2840)) until the start of your next turn. Attacks by [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=632) creatures (such as a ghost’s ghostly hand) count as ghost touch.
  • **Weapon** After you cast a spell by activating the planchette, the affixed weapon gains the effects of the _ghost touch_ property rune until the end of your next turn.
**Activate** Cast a Spell; **Effect** You cast [_void warp_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1745). Ghostcaller's Planchette **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 125 2.0 **Price** 1,750 gp --- **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** You cast [_invoke spirits_](/Spells.aspx?ID=937). Ghostcaller's Planchette (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 125 2.0 **Price** 21,000 gp --- The resistance when affixed to armor is 10. When the planchette is affixed to a weapon, casting a spell by activating the planchette grants the weapon the effects of both the _ghost touch_ and [_greater vitalizing_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2852) property runes. The spell DC is 38. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** You cast 7th-rank [_invoke spirits_](/Spells.aspx?ID=937). **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** You cast [_tempest of shades_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1015).
name: Ghostcaller's Planchette (Greater)
